heroSection.title: Innover, Transformer, Réussir.
heroSection.description: Suivez, Gérez Et Réduisez Votre Empreinte Carbone Avec Green Genius.

footer.description: Green Genius is a SaaS platform that helps businesses track, manage, and reduce their carbon footprint. It offers tools for supply management, order management, transportation, waste management, and CO2 reporting to support sustainable solutions.
